backend/main.mo: Main canister logic implementing access control, user profiles, Bible story and verse data structures, and initial story seed data.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op migration function that returns the existing actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend image component fix with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, favicon links, and mounts the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saving it via backend queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall site layout with header navigation, login button, profile dialog, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: Component that displays the current story/verse image and lets admins upload and validate a new image with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/components/story/PublicImag: Wrapper component that loads an ExternalBlob image URL and shows a fallback UI if loading fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and retrieves a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and stored identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, admin status, stories, verses, daily verse, and image uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode colors, and typography/utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Page that fetches and displays the daily verse with loading, error, and manual refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page offering navigation cards linking to daily verses, stories, and testament pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Displays a list of Bible stories with loading and error states and navigates to individual story pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific story, including image upload and verse list.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Fetches and lists verses from either the Old or New Testament with navigation to verse detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific verse, including optional image and back navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme settings, color tokens, plugins, and container layout.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for a Bible‑verse website, including admin‑only image uploads and a daily verse system. Marks an image‑loading bug as a fix request.
